columns.name: InsertId
columns.description: A unique identifier for the log entry used to prevent duplication.

columns.name: Labels
columns.description: A set of key-value pairs that provide additional metadata about the log entry.

columns.name: LogName
columns.description: The full resource name of the log to which this log entry belongs.

columns.name: Operation
columns.description: Information about an operation associated with the log entry, such as an audit trail or trace context.

columns.name: ProtoPayload
columns.description: The structured payload of the log entry, typically in protocol buffer format; contains detailed event data.

columns.name: ReceiveTimestamp
columns.description: The time the log entry was received by the logging system.

columns.name: Resource
columns.description: Information about the monitored resource associated with the log entry, such as VM instance, database, etc.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: The severity level of the log entry (e.g., DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL).

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The actual time the event described by the log entry occurred.
